org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.matching.single.cypher.operators.expand

Class ExpandEmbeddings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.matching.single.cypher.operators.expand.ExpandEmbeddings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PhysicalOperator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExpandEmbeddingsBulk, ExpandEmbeddingsForLoop

    public abstract class ExpandEmbeddings
extends Object
implements PhysicalOperator
    Expands an vertex along the edges. The number of hops can be specified via upper and lower bound The input embedding is appended by 2 Entries, the first one represents the path (edge, vertex, edge, vertex, ..., edge), the second one the end vertex

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExpandEmbeddings

        public ExpandEmbeddings(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<Embedding> input,
                        org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<Embedding> candidateEdges,
                        int expandColumn,
                        int lowerBound,
                        int upperBound,
                        ExpandDirection direction,
                        List<Integer> distinctVertexColumns,
                        List<Integer> distinctEdgeColumns,
                        int closingColumn,
                        org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.base.JoinOperatorBase.JoinHint joinHint)
        New Expand One Operator
        Parameters:
        input - the embedding which should be expanded
        candidateEdges - candidate edges along which we expand
        expandColumn - specifies the input column that represents the vertex from which we expand
        lowerBound - specifies the minimum hops we want to expand
        upperBound - specifies the maximum hops we want to expand
        direction - direction of the expansion (see ExpandDirection)
        distinctVertexColumns - indices of distinct input vertex columns
        distinctEdgeColumns - indices of distinct input edge columns
        closingColumn - defines the column which should be equal with the paths end
        joinHint - join strategy

        public org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<Embedding> evaluate()
        Runs a traversal over the given edgeCandidates withing the given bounds
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface PhysicalOperator
        Returns:
        the input appened by 2 entries (IdList(Path), IdEntry(End Vertex)

      • iterate

        protected abstract org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<ExpandEmbedding> iterate(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<ExpandEmbedding> initialWorkingSet)
        Runs the iterative traversal
        Parameters:
        initialWorkingSet - the initial edges which are used as starting points for the traversal
        Returns:
        set of paths produced by the iteration (length 1..upperBound)
